page.title: 08Recreation for Children-E.C.
page.content:
{GIRLS BOYS BOTH } Guides Scouts Youth Club Brownies Cubs Piano Football Ballet B.Brigade Karate Fishing Kay Club Judo Dancing Playscheme
{THE YOUTH CLUB The Youth Club is held in East Calder school once a week all year round. It costs 20p to get in.You have to be seven years old to start and you have to leave when you start High School. The Youth Club is held from 6.30pm to 8.30pm.There is a disco which is supervised by a teenager.The games room has snooker tables and board games. by Joanne and Caroline.
